successSection.ps: *The displayed return rate is an average calculated from all crowdfunding debentures offered on the platform. Past performance does not guarantee future results. Actual returns may vary depending on the specific crowdfunding debentures invested in. Crowdfunding debenture investments carry a high level of risk; investors should carefully review all relevant information before making investment decisions.

seo.title: Investree (Thailand) - Crowdfunding Made Simple
seo.description: Investree (Thailand) is a Securities and Exchange Commission of Thailand-approved crowdfunding platform. Our platform connects Thai SMEs seeking capital with investors looking for investment opportunities. Our platform makes it easy for everyone to participate in the growth of a sustainable economy.
